com.opengamma.strata.pricer.bond

Interface BlackVolatilityBondFutureProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BondFutureProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackVolatilityExpLogMoneynessBondFutureProvider

    public interface BlackVolatilityBondFutureProvider
extends BondFutureProvider
    Data provider of volatility for bond future options in the lognormal or Black model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StandardId getFutureSecurityId()
      Returns the ID on which the underlying future is based.
      ZonedDateTime getValuationDateTime()
      Gets the valuation date-time.
      double getVolatility(ZonedDateTime expiry, LocalDate fixingDate, double strikePrice, double futurePrice)
      Returns the normal volatility.
      double relativeTime(ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime)
      Converts a date to a relative double time.

    • Method Detail

      • getValuationDateTime

        ZonedDateTime getValuationDateTime()
        Gets the valuation date-time.
        Returns:
        the valuation date-time

      • getVolatility

        double getVolatility(ZonedDateTime expiry,
                     LocalDate fixingDate,
                     double strikePrice,
                     double futurePrice)
        Returns the normal volatility.
        Parameters:
        expiry - the expiry date-time of the option
        fixingDate - the underlying future fixing date
        strikePrice - the option strike price
        futurePrice - the price of the underlying future
        Returns:
        the volatility
